items.sentence: I just hope that Tom and Mary weren't injured.
I don't think that Tom knows Mary isn't happy.
I don't think that Tom knows Mary is Canadian.
I don't think that Tom is as smart as Mary is.
It's obvious that Tom really cares about Mary.
Tom told me he was afraid Mary might kill him.
Tom told me he thought that Mary was confused.
Tom told me that he thought that Mary was mad.
Tom told me he thought that Mary was stubborn.
Do you know what Tom said about you yesterday?
